net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.impl

Class SearchIndexerMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableObject
      • net.sf.mmm.util.cli.api.AbstractMain
        • net.sf.mmm.util.cli.api.AbstractVersionedMain
          • net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base.AbstractSearchIndexerMain
            • net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.impl.SearchIndexerMain

  • public class SearchIndexerMain
extends AbstractSearchIndexerMain
    This is the main program that triggers the search-indexer according to a given configuration. It uses springframework as IocContainer.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • getIocContainer

        public IocContainer getIocContainer()
        An IocContainer is required. Override this method to provide it. This method gets the IocContainer used to manage components with their implementation. It should be created and initialized on the first call of this method.
        This default implementation simply returns null to avoid dependencies on a IocContainer implementation. Override this method to use proper component management.
        Specified by:
        getIocContainer in class AbstractSearchIndexerMain
        Returns:
        the IocContainer.
        See Also:
        SpringContainer
